name: The Louisville Sling
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces club soda, more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker, combine sugar with 2 tablespoons hot tap water and shake until sugar dissolves. Add tamarind and lemon; shake well. Pour into ice-filled highball glasses. Top with club soda and add two dashes of bitters to each glass.
Hold each orange strip under a match or lighter for 10 seconds until it just begins to color. Twist strips and drop one into each drink; serve.
